title: Airwheel Intelligent Personal Transportation Electric Self-Balancing Scooter
text: Airwheel Intelligent Personal Transportation Electric Self-Balancing Scooter Autumn is coming and travelling becomes increasingly popular these days. In order to echo with the theme of environmental protection, it is advocated that people should drive less and take public transportation instead. As to fashionable people, they would go for another option - riding an Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter. With a long range and strong trafficability, it is an eco-friendly travel essential for common people. USA, 30 September 2015 -- As autumn comes near, people tend to go out on a trip. Transportation is thereby an issue they have to consider. Being consistent with the theme of environmental protection, it is suggested that people should take public transportation rather than drive their own cars so as to reduce emission of exhaust. Actually, as for fashionable people, they are fond of another transport. That is Airwheel self-balancing electric scooter , an eco-friendly and convenient transport with a long range. As the currently most popular intelligent scooter , Airwheel self-balancing scooter is like Chanel or Burberry, which stands for fashion and popularity. This kind of fashion actually stems from people’s growing awareness of environmental protection. Unlike traditional transports, Airwheelintelligent scooter is not powered by fossil fuel, so it will not produce exhaust and pollute the environment. Instead, it is equipped with Sony lithium batteries that enable the vehicle to have strong and steady power capacity. Plus, the battery has a long lifespan for it can be recharged for 1800 times. What’s more, generally, when the transport is fully recharged, it can reach a range of up to 48 km under common circumstances.Apart from that, Airwheel electric unicycle is also easy to steer. There is no need for users to hit the brake or accelerator. They are able to steer the vehicle via sheer body movements. When riders change their tilting angle to lean forward or backward, the transport will march forward or retreat accordingly. Therefore, this kind of transport is well-received by consumers, especially young people. Also, since it adopts the top-quality Cheng Shin tires, it is able to conquer various terrains that it may encounter. Airwheel intelligent self-balancing scooter is such an environmentallyfriendly and convenient transport that everyone should have one for travelling. With its help, travelling could be so easy. # # #
